attributes.action: Improve and expand Clapham Common Skatepark
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The skate park situated on Clapham Common has become old and damaged and was badly designed and built when it was first constructed, we are proposing an expansion and replacement of equipment/redoing the whole park in concrete in order to become a skateboarding landmark.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Lambeth Council
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
